page.title: 12Light Industry 2
page.content: In buildings on Foster's Fruit Farm two small businesses operate. Windermere Windows make wooden door, window and conservatory frames, and fit them with ready made aluminium units. 4 men are employed. Business is by personal recommendation, from the Essex coast to Buckinghamshire and south to the Thames. Two men work at Jiggins Kitchens making and fitting kitchen units. Lynfield Motors employ 52 people, 34 of whom live locally. The property covers 6 acres near the A12, and provides vehicle servicing, car sales and hire, parts sales, petrol and diesel supplies, car wash and bodywork repairs. The company has a subsidiary in Wickham Bishops.
